text:
''Color:'' Pale orange
''Associated [[Dragonmark|dragonmark]]:'' [[Sentinel|Mark of Sentinel]]
''Associated [[Plane|plane]]:'' [[Lamannia]]
''Associated [[Month|Khorvaire calendar]]:'' 2nd To the naked eye, the orange disk of Olarune seems to have a slight fringe that vaguely resembles the rim of a shield. The [[druid]]s say that those born when Olarune is ascendant have a strong bond to community and to order, and a natural desire to protect others; superstition holds that more [[paladin]]s are born in this month than any other. Scattered [[therianthrope]]s, especially weretigers, revere Olarune as a sort of demigoddess-protector.
title: Olarune
